title: How to install
NymVPN on any Linux distribution
linux.description: The client app is provided as a portable AppImage and daemon is provided as a prebuilt binary wrapped as a systemd service

steps.title: 1. Download and install NymVPN
steps.description: To download and install the NymVPN macOS app, click on the "Download app" button above. Double-click the downloaded .dmg file to mount the "NymVPN Installer" disk image.

steps.title: 2. Optional: Verify the SHA-256 hash
steps.description: You can verify the SHA-256 hash of the downloaded file.

steps.title: 3. Install the app
steps.description: In the "NymVPN Installer" disk image, drag and drop the NymVPN app in your Application folder. Then, in your Application folder, open the NymVPN app.

steps.title: 4. Grant necessary permissions
steps.description: Upon opening the NymVPN app, click "Yes" in the modal window asking you if you are sure to open it.

steps.title: 5. Install the helper tool
steps.description: The app opens. Click on "Connect". To allow NymVPN to run network connections in the background, install the mandatory NymVPN helper: Type your device or account password, and click "Install Helper". The System Settings will open, and a NymVPN line will be added in the "Allow in the Background" section.

steps.title: 6. Enter your credential and connect
steps.description: Click on "Connect". Enter your NymVPN account credentials when prompted and enjoy!

faqs.title: Is NymVPN compatible with all operating systems?
faqs.description: NymVPN is compatible with the main operating systems, including Android, iOS, Linux, macOS and Windows. We will expand support to additional operating systems, browsers and devices in the near future.

faqs.title: How many devices can I use with one NymVPN subscription?
faqs.description: NymVPN will allow simultaneous connections on multiple devices. Stay tuned!

faqs.title: Does NymVPN offer a money-back guarantee?
faqs.description: NymVPN will offer either 7-day or 30-day prorated money-back guarantees. Specific terms may apply based on the subscription and payment method.

faqs.title: Does NymVPN offer a free trial?
faqs.description: NymVPN does not offer a free trial at the moment. However, we are continuously developing new offerings, so stay tuned for updates.
